original_text: Then it shall be, that, when ye eat of the bread of the land, ye shall offer up an heave offering unto the Lord.
korean_text: 그 땅의 양식을 먹을 때에 여호와께 거제를 드리되

sentences.original_text: when ye eat of the bread of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그 땅의 빵을 먹을 때

sentences.original_text: ye shall offer up an heave offering
